name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CPS Test - Check Click Per Second

long.ar,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,fi,fr,:
The cps test ( Click Speed test ) is a game there you can set the highest click speed score and break others click speed records. Test your CPS Now!. 1 Second,2second,3 second and 5 second click speed test options available.

Build your record own at Cpstest.org. Test your clicks per second. You can also set a new record. Share your score with your friend and challenge them to beat you.

Cps Test lets you test your clicking speed by different methods in one place. You can take clicking tests like Kohi Click Test, Jitter Click Test, and Click Speed Test.

 It also shows your last five scores. It provokes you to click faster than before and improve your clicking speed. You can take a click per second from a 1-second test to 100 seconds test. Practice regularly for just five minutes will diffidently help you with improving your clicking speed.

These days the pro gamers spend a lot of time focusing on improving their mouse-clicking speed to beat their opponent at gaming. Many users are also attempting typing tests from our tool. It helps you improve your typing speed.

 It is also an unrestricted, easy-to-use user-friendly interface where you can test your word per minute score and improve your online typing speed. We recommend our users focus more on their typing accuracy than speed. Because speed can come with accuracy, despite the fact that you can't lose your accuracy. More Tests:

1.Kohi Click Test: Kohli is a Minecraft server that is famous among gamers. Cps Test provides the exclusive clicking test for Minecraft users. We all know how clicking is crucial in Minecraft games. Because when you fail to click faster on your opponent, it is easy to beat you!

2.Jitter Click Test: The jitter clicking is the special clicking method, and many top clickers use this method to beat the record. It is a method where you centralize all arm strength to the finger and land massive clicks.

3.Typing Test: Many users are also attempting typing tests from our tool. It helps you improve your typing speed. It is also an unrestricted, easy-to-use user-friendly interface where you can test your word per minute score and improve your online typing speed. We recommend our users focus more on their typing accuracy than speed. Because speed can come with accuracy, despite the fact that you can't lose your accuracy. 

Why should you use Cpstest.org?

It is globally known for testing users' clicks per second score. It is the only website that provides a gaming interface for testing user's clicking speed. It shows your click speed rank proportional to the fastest animal running speed so that you can easily define where you and your clicking speed stands. Features: 

Gaming Interface: It provides a very stunning user interface just like a game that is easy to use. 

Unlimited access: You can take as many tests as you want. Clicking modes: It has a clicking mode from 1 second to 100 seconds.

Score Comparison: You can compare your last five scores. It will help you with improving your overall cps score.

Powered by https://cpstest.org
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,en,en_AU,et,fa,fil,gu,he,:
The cps test ( Click Speed test ) is a game where you can set the highest click speed score and break others' click speed records. Test your CPS Now! 

These days pro gamers spend a lot of time focusing on improving their mouse-clicking speed to beat their opponent at gaming. Many users are also attempting typing tests from our tool. It helps you improve your typing speed.

Version 3.2.1

1. Dark Mode
The dark mode is an add-on that helps you quickly turn the screen to dark and eases your eyes by inverting the brightness.

2. Improved UI & UX
This update introduces new and improved UI & UX features to help you perform more efficiently and effectively. 

3. Previous Five Score Under One Month
Our latest update includes a feature that lets users track their previous five scores from the past month which comes with a pop-up feature, so they can see their progress over time.

4. Sound Button
We've added the sound button on our extension to enhance gameplay.

5. Full-Screen Mode
You now have the Full-Screen Mode option with this update. This means that you can now view your content on the full screen of your device without any distractions. 

6. Result Sharing Option
We're introducing a new result-sharing option! Now you can easily share your results with others, and get feedback on your performance more quickly and easily than ever before.

7. Know Your CPS Rate
 This will help you determine how fast you can click and how accurate you are with your clicks.

8. Bug Fixes
We fixed a few bugs and made some improvements with this latest update!
